column2: Top Comments: Super Pink Moon (Music) Edition
column5: Tonight is the first of several (at least two and some sources say four) supermoons we’ll see in 2021. A Supermoon is a full moon that coincides with perigee —  the moon’s closest point to Earth each monthly orbit. Many cultures names the moons based on natural events occuring at the particular time of year; this month is known as the Pink Moon because the moss pink herb or wild ground phlox flower is generally widespread by this point in spring.
